mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.RECIPE_NO, A.ID, A.TITLE, A.TOOL, A.CONTENT1, A.CONTENT2, A.WRITE_AT, A.MODIFIED_AT, A.IMG_FILE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RECIPE_NO ASC) AS RN, RECIPE_NO, ID, TITLE, TOOL, CONTENT1, CONTENT2, WRITE_AT, MODIFIED_AT, IMG_FILE_NAME FROM RECIPE) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
